languages.text: "Как только Эклендиль наберется сил, то покинет Лилэтан сквозь врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. Не спрашивай, куда уведет его Путь — он идет собственной дорогой судьбы, и пусть так и будет".

traits.locale_text: "Как только Эклендиль наберется сил, то покинет Лилэтан сквозь врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. Не спрашивай, куда уведет его Путь — он идет собственной дрогой судьбы, и пусть так и будет".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."
languages.original_text: "Как только Эклендиль наберется сил, то покинет Лилэтан сквозь врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}. Не спрашивай, куда уведет его Путь — он идет собственной дорогой судьбы, и пусть так и будет".

traits.locale_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “等埃克伦迪恢复了力量之后，他会通过{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}门离开莉莱赞。不要询问他的道途会将他指向何处，因为那是他自己的命运之路，我们不该进行干涉。”
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: “等埃克伦迪恢复了力量之后，他会通过{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}门离开莉莱赞。不要询问他的道途会将他指向何处，因为那是他自己的命运之路，我们不该进行干涉。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the Webway Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

languages.text: «En cuanto Eklendyl recupere las fuerzas, abandonará el Lilaethan a través del portal de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. No preguntes adónde le llevará su Senda, pues sigue el camino de su propio destino. Es como debe ser».
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto Eklendyl recupere las fuerzas, abandonará el Lilaethan a través del portal de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. No preguntes adónde le llevará su Senda, pues sigue el camino de su propio destino. Es como debe ser».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エクレンディルは力を蓄え次第、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}門を通ってリラエタンを発つだろう。彼がどこの道をたどるのか、尋ねてはならない。彼は自らの運命の道を歩む。そうあるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: 「エクレンディルは力を蓄え次第、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}門を通ってリラエタンを発つだろう。彼がどこの道をたどるのか、尋ねてはならない。彼は自らの運命の道を歩む。そうあるべきだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sobald Eklendyl seine Kraft gesammelt hat, wird er die Welt der Lileath durch das Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} verlassen. Fragt nicht, wohin sein Pfad ihn führen wird, denn er folgt nur der Straße seiner eigenen Bestimmung. Es ist, wie es sein sollte."
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald Eklendyl seine Kraft gesammelt hat, wird er die Welt der Lileath durch das Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} verlassen. Fragt nicht, wohin sein Pfad ihn führen wird, denn er folgt nur der Straße seiner eigenen Bestimmung. Es ist, wie es sein sollte."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Dès qu'Eklendyl aura repris des forces, il quittera la lilaethan par le portail sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. Ne cherchez pas à savoir où sa Voie le mènera, car il est guidé par sa propre destinée. Comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: « Dès qu'Eklendyl aura repris des forces, il quittera la lilaethan par le portail sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. Ne cherchez pas à savoir où sa Voie le mènera, car il est guidé par sa propre destinée. Comme il se doit. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eklendyl gücünü topladığı an {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçidi'nden geçerek Lilaethan'dan ayrılacak. Yolunun onu nereye götüreceğini sorma. Kendi yazgısının sıratını izliyor. Öyle de olması gerek."
languages.original_text: "As soon as Eklendyl gathers his strength, he will depart the Lilaethan through the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate. Do not ask where his Path takes him, he follows the road of his own destiny. It is as it should be."

traits.locale_text: "Eklendyl gücünü topladığı an {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçidi'nden geçerek Lilaethan'dan ayrılacak. Yolunun onu nereye götüreceğini sorma. Kendi yazgısının yolunu izliyor. Öyle de olması gerek."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
